name: Ironhack App
description:
Ironhack Workshop #5 - Animations

In this file, you will find different pages with proposed animation exercises. You will also find solution pages, but don't cheat and learn Figma as you go!

Work with Smart Animate to create the transitions, interactions, and animations that will take the prototypes to the next level. 

As a result of the workshop, you'll have learned how to prototype some of the most popular app transitions nowadays.
